item.title: Toronto Awards Analysis: Bill Skarsgard Could Be a Contender for Gus Van Sant’s Sales Title ‘Dead Man’s Wire’
item.description: Based on the true story of a 1977 crime, the film feels eerily timely as the Luigi Mangione case proceeds in court.

item.title: Gus Van Sant to Be Honored by Venice Film Festival With Campari Passion for Film Award
